Developing the web by Creating for You.

Hey there! Welcome to my personal portfolio, I'm Sander van Ast and here you'll find my collection of projects and skills that I've collected over the years. I'm currently a student at the Grafisch Lyceum Rotterdam based in The Netherlands as a full-stack developer.

I'm also a graphic designer, UI & UX designer, Lego technic builder, speedcuber, computer enthusiast and a tech savvy.

Strengths

Graphic Design

One of my interests is graphic design. I believe that a corporate identity is one of the important focus for your personality, which makes you known as a brand.

Wireframe Design

A wireframe is a fundamental part of a design. It determines the layout of a website. A unique design will stay in your memory, it makes you recognizable.

Web Development

Web development is the course that I follow, this is also what I want to do as a profession. I have the space to experiment with different designs & technologies, this help me develop more.

Qualities
Creative

My inpiration comes from all different places. From simply surfing the web to taking the racing bike for a spin.

Organized

To structure my files and storage space is very important to me, it allows me to quickly navigate through files to save time and effort.

Focused

When I'm starting something such as a project I make sure that I'm fully dedicated to it, I'm a person that doesn't get distracted quickly.

Studious

Knowledge is power in my opinion, so the more knowledge I have the more things I could achieve. I've this in the back of my mind.

Supportive

Helping other people is one of the things I enjoy doing. Giving them what they where looking for; a designer website.
